metadata.title: PANDORA May Droplet Ring, Size Royal-Green Crystal, Size 8
features: Exquisitely crafted in sustainable & durable materials
description: Rich royal green crystal elegantly represents the month of May on this stunning sterling silver birthstone ring in the Droplets series. Linked to wisdom, growth and patience, the vivid green stone gains a feminine and floral flourish due to the new flower dome cut on top of the stone.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.72 x 3.62 x 0.31 inches; 0.71 Ounces", "Item model number": "191012NRG-52", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "September 13, 2016", "Manufacturer": "Pandora", "Country of Origin": "Thailand"}
